_sText:
Otstrel.ru presents new gungame map gg_xlighty.

This is our first map. We made it from scratch in 2 weeks. There are two floors, round stairs, house, tunnel, towers, and orange textures. There are some gungame specific hint places, a lot of color lights, and of course grenades! Custom textures and radar minimap included in bsp file.

Map is best played with 8-16 players in both DM and Classic GunGame modes.
Feedbacks are always welcome.

next map [gg_block9](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/156400 "gg_block9")
